reviews_data.review_text: I have experienced some of the worst experiences at this location. I really try not to order from this location unless I'm running behind due to I have to pass this establishment daily to get to my business. The barista's at this location lack empathy and customer service. This was my last time coming here and I'm not surprised that when I came to write a review they only have 3 stars that speaks volumes right there. I spoke with the manager and explained what was wrong with my drink and the only explanation she could provide was oh we're trying to come back from Covid not how may I fix the issue. I ordered the strawberry A√ßa√≠ with extra sugar. They left out the dry strawberries but when I went it other drinks were being prepared with them for me to be told oh I just opened those. Excuse me ma'am did you not think to open them early on when you see you were running out. The drink is was very watery with lemonade added. Skip this location if you can that's all I will say.

The so called manager named Melody has extremely poor customer service. She closes the restaurant before the scheduled close time and doesn't serve customers. I hope the corporate office knows that she portrays such horrible customer service and literally doesn't serve customers. I'll never understand for the life of me why miserable horrible managers such as Melody sign up for jobs just to be lazy managers and deliver sorry customer service! Shame on you Starbucks for dropping the ball by hiring such a horrible, low-class mistake like Melody.

This is a beautiful store (two floors) with a drive through that runs nonstop. From what I saw the folks that work there do a fantastic job in a very high stress/volume situation. Even so, this will be my first and last visit to this store due to an extremely unpleasant experience I had there with my family on a cold pre Christmas evening.  My daughter was home from school and we stopped into this Starbucks store for a warm drink and to catch up. Our drinks were perfect and we went upstairs to get away from the draft that blew when the doors opened.  There was an older masked man sitting at the corner table hidden behind a backpack and open laptop on his table that stared at me menacingly as I took a table by the window out of his view. My daughter came up behind me and said that he stared at her with both middle fingers straight up. I thought nothing of it and we started chatting. At one point he walked into my view to peer over the railing down stairs. He kept shaking his hand at me as if to shoo us away. That caught my attention! When we finished and were preparing to leave, he glared at us and again raised his middle finger. I asked him from across the room what he was doing and he said with a sneer ‚ÄúF@&K YOU‚Äù! With my family there I did not want to engage any further so we quickly went downstairs to speak to the staff. They described him and unapologetically said they knew exactly who he was. The whole time he glared down at us from upstairs. We got the feeling that at this Starbucks store it was accepted that an abusive obscene masked man owns the upstairs lounge and it was not a family oriented store so we left. As we walked to our cars he continued his one finger salute from the upstairs window near the table we were just sitting at. Both my wife and daughter -who are avid Starbucks customers- said they were glad I was there or they would have not felt safe and further said they would not return either.
Love that it has 2 stories. Don't see a lot of Starbucks stores with 2 levels.
Just waited 45 minutes for my drinks. That is absurd. When busy, the manager needs to stop accepting mobile orders. There were about 20 drinks at one point from mobile orders who weren't even there.

They were three workers down and the three employees on staff were working their butts off to get us our orders even though it was 40 minutes late. The lady pictured was really calm and collected despite the hustle and stress.
Always great here. Enjoy the staff. Super friendly and helpful.
My favorite drinks at Starbucks are frappucinos. I love my almond milk and coconut milk with a frappe
Fast  service . Very kind Staff  . Recommend to all !
Love their breakfast sandwiches and the Caramel Crunch Frap....my FAV!
Got cup coffee after game was pleasant and enjoyable

I had an excellent experience at Starbucks near South Park. My daughter had an ear appointment so I ordered on the app.  Even though I chose drive thru and I met some very nice employees and I hope that I put a smile on their faces for the rest of the day because I told them how thankful I was that they were there and working to keep us fed! Thank you so much for making our delicious coffees as always
Daniel is a very great worker! Very considerate & Can perfectly Multitask.
Super hip location.

Absolutely the SLOWEST Starbucks drive thru I have ever been to. design of the parking lot/drive thru is horrible and inefficient. I don't know what it is, but every time I come here it is always a 20+ minute wait in the drive Thru.

Very busy location -- people are friendly & work hard to get the orders out fast -- bustling -- maybe some of the negative reviews are from folks who have "high maintenance" orders?  Go in & watch them work ‚Ä¶ no one is standing around -- go there often and it is a great atmosphere -- thank you!

I walked into StarBucks, no one Greeted me. I had a feeling this location was a bad choice. I went to RestRm. Tissue all over floor.Dining Floors appear filthy. I went upstairs to look, as I was a 1st time Visitor of this location. No problem. Came back downstairs to see if I would get acknowledged. One lady said hi, then another said I will be with you shortly. I asked for a Bus. Card, so I could contact Corp. Off. No cards. Asked for Mgr. She was a lady who stood before me but never Greeted. They were comfortable not Greeting anyone. Check Reviews before you get bad Service. I'm planning to contact Corp. on Mon. Nasty location with a 97.5 rating.

I went through the drive thru and as soon as I heard the employees voice I figured I was going to get a bad customer service which I did. It seemed like the employee did not want to work. I got a simple drink and asked for extra caramel drizzle. When I pulled up to the window, the employee didn't say hi or anything just the price. I saw another employee give her my drink which she held up, looked at it confused and proceeded to hand it to me. There was no extra caramel drizzle in my drink and on top of that they filled it up to the top to the point where it was spilling out. She didn't offer a straw and when I asked for one it felt as if I bothered her for asking. Surprised on the bad customer service at this Starbucks!

Terrible customer service and the drinks taste different compared to other Starbucks stores. I ordered a Strawberry A√ßa√≠ Lemonade drink but they gave me the regular Strawberry A√ßa√≠ drink without the lemonade because they were out of lemonade even though I paid for the lemonade. No refund, no other options provided. They also didn't know how to make the dragon drink I ordered as well. It tasted bad. Never coming back here as long as the same employees with bad customer service work here.
My daughter has turned me into a Starbucks fan. We always order the vanilla bean frap and I love the acai strawberry lemonade. Very refreshing and delicious.
I thought this was just a novelty mug store, but they also sell coffee, day-old pastries and juice!
Good as they can get
Clean inside, nice upstairs, quick service.
Good location for a meeting
Long wait and gave me wrong drink it was still good tho lol
Slow service prices do not make sense alway out of food
(Translated by Google) Great  (Original) Excelente
Regular Thursday morning spot - Great atmosphere, always a cheerful greeting - Thank you!
(Translated by Google) Very friendly and very good cashiers  (Original) Muy amables y muy buenas cajeras
My drink was fantastic an my barista was very sweet young lady
Customer service here needs coaching.

The hours on Google are incorrect. It lists the drive-thru as closing at 8:30 pm Monday through Friday and 9:30 pm on weekends, and these hours were confirmed by the business one week ago. When I went through the drive-thru this evening (a Saturday), they said they closed at 8. The drinks from this location are usually not very good and the customer service is always very marginal.

So sorry if this is personal for a review but about 2 months ago we unexpectedly lost our sweet dog and I just needed to stay out of my house as much as possible. I thought I could at least make it to the Starbucks drive through without breaking down but as soon as I pulled up the window and saw the pictures of the dogs I immediately broke down.  The woman at the window was so kind, told me she was so sorry and asked how she could help, and gave me a couple of gift cards.  I know that seems like not a big deal but to me on that day it meant everything.  I actually went in there in person for first time today and every single employee greeted me and asked how I was.  I'm with my children full time so I don't go too many places alone these days but this will forever be my go to spot when I need some peace (and some great service).  Thank you!
So slow.
Great place but unfortunately it's now closing super early on the weekends ( 8pm ) witch it's really annoying.
Really nice Starbucks, but ridiculously long drive thru line and very little parking in the parking lot.

By far the worse customer service of any starbucks in the chatlotte Area both shifts lied about the company policy for catering and didn't want to give me corporate number I will not put there names in here but you shouldn't have rude people with racist undertones at your location in this area this will not help your business. The most disrespectful employees work here buyer beware go to the Park town location or East Blvd if you want to be treated with respect.
Casey/KC/not sure how to spell it, was great. Thank you!

Its a pretty good Starbucks. Great size with a second floor, they're drinks were good, staff was kind and overall just a nice calm experience. Only downside someone may see here is that they are usually pretty busy at this location so if you want something quicker try another if you have the time :)
(Translated by Google) Excellent service  (Original) ŒÜœÅŒπœÉœÑŒ∑ ŒµŒæœÖœÄŒ∑œÅŒ≠œÑŒ∑œÉŒ∑
Varista had an attitude. Tge place was not clean
I love coming to this Starbucks as everybody here is super friendly. I've been regulars at many coffee places through my travels and the consistency here is üëåüèª
Gets busy in the morning til about 12, was a bit noisy for me to work, but in the afternoon it's more relaxed. Lots of tables set up for people to work from.
Isa and Darrell were fantastic baristas, they had exceptional customer service and made the best drink suggestions.
Consistently the slowest Starbucks I've ever been to! Do. Not. Go. There! Terrible..

Starbucks was nice.. Starbucks was cheery.. I went to Starbucks with my special deary. She had coffee of some fruity variety.. I just decided no coffee Me. I'd just.. Try a Tea.. Our order was searved.. By a young man with a brite big smile.. A courteous manner And With flair and with style.. His poney tail looked soft and oh so shiny.. Told my wife I want one and then I got all whiney. So we had our drinks.. Made merriment with the staff.. All those young poney tails.. They Did make us laff.. A great nite was had for us and these memories well keep...We tipped well.. Cause hair product.. Well it ain't cheap. Starbucks is coffee.. Can be bought anywhere.. But the staff here.. Are nice.. And they seem to really care. That is my story.. That is my tale.. Come here.. Enjoy.. And tip well. The life you save.. WILL have a poney tail..The end
Really dirty store. This location needs some help - it's constantly dirty, slow and none of the employees seem happy.
Good location. Has a drive thru but also offers indoor seating. They also have two floors to choose from. The staff was friendly and made my experience memorable.
Only drive thru is ridiculous and unhealthy completely opposite with a relax and active life

I can't wait to come get my birthday drink cause this location UNDERSTANDETH a true coffee drinker's struggle! Coffee is my jumpstart so great customer service can't be sacrificed for this reason and I keep having such pleasurable experiences here! Thanks, crew! üòä

Not LGBTQ+ friendly!!!! Misgendered twice in less than 3 mins, when brought to attention received a condescending alright with a flippant attitude. This is after waiting 7 minutes at speaker in the drive thru, only one in line, followed by another 6 at the window. Tuesday 2 Oct 2021 6:35pm.

Stay way away from this store from 6 am-12 pm because they have absolutely what they are working on. Taking orders getting mobiles in. Telling people they are at the wrong store. Then half order showing up and drinks not showing up. Asking people what they orderers are people have no idea where their stuff is it is absolutely craziness they are massively understaffed

Coffee and service were fine.  Don't go here to work though, since it is very loud even with very few patrons.  AND there are very few parking spaces. Not everyone lives or works on that block!  Drive up line was in the street.
The staff is always very nice. I'm thrilled they have an Impossible breakfast sandwich.
People aren't kidding by saying this is the slowest one ever. Drive-through line is rough, 20 minutes for one cold coffee is a lot of wait (especially when it's 1pm on a Wednesday).

Thank you so much Aaron for making my Pink Drink today. He made it just right. His customer service was unmatched from taking my order to making my drink. I could see him smiling through his masks. I wish all of my customer service experiences were like üòä
Slowest drive thru ever. I literally cannot comprehend why it takes 20 minutes every morning to get a coffee. All employees move at a snail pace. Please improve its not hard to do.

I try to give this Starbucks the benefit of the doubt time and time again, but they continually disappoint. Service is the SLOWEST and most inefficient I've ever seen- I always wait in line for at least 20-40 minutes. The workers always seem miserable & the actual product is inconsistent. Definitely in need of new management or efficiency training. Will not be wasting my time trying to come to this location anymore.
They seem to be doing much better now with new management.
Are you guys open or what? Every day is different and the number to call no longer works.
Terrible driver through service. Not enough staff‚Ä¶ lines are ridiculous.
Tasty drinks and friendly staff.
Long wait times and they messed up my order on two occasions.
Great store! The drive-thru here isn't as bad as some folks make it out to be; consider that we're lucky to have a coffee shop with the option!
Good

As of 5/31/21 the store is still not open. This is one of those locations still using Covid as an excuse to do half of their job. You can't go in to pick up an online order or to just go through the line so you'll be sitting in the drive-through for half an hour.

This is the most aggravating Starbucks because they are never open during the hours listed on google. I have arrived here many times over the past two years because it is in a convenient location and no matter what time of the day they always seem to be closed. This morning I found a hand written sign on the drive through window stating they open at 6 now not 5am.... other times no signs just closed
The worst customer service and branch of sb.
Never open for mobile preorder üëéüèª
This particular Starbucks is always closed for in store pick up or ordering. So inconsistent.

I cannot emphasize enough how slow this Starbucks is. It's quicker to park at SouthPark mall down the street and visit their Starbucks than to sit through this drive thru. I recommend avoiding at all costs.
Close early and when they are open no mobile orders allowed and you wait in drive thru over 20 minutes! No way I am returning

Hands down the worst Starbucks I have ever been to. It is right by my work so I have been here many times. Pre-covid they got my order wrong on several occasions, and the staff was not the friendliest. Now order-ahead is hardly ever available or the store is closed altogether. When they are open it only seems to be the drive-thru, which is already poorly designed and causes traffic to backup. I now only go to this location if I am absolutely desperate for coffee. I wish that corporate would address this as they are probably losing a lot of the business from nearby hotels and offices.

This location is absolutely in the WRONG spot. The drive thru is 100 feet from main intersection in Charlotte NC.  Why in the world would any builder or franchise owner want a STARBUCKS on the corner of a busy intersection? I had no problem with the Frappuccino nor the service from the attendant.  But the wait in line was horrendous.  The parking lot is suitable for only 5 cars. Ridiculous!
The drive thu is convenient...when it's open. This location needs new mgmt.
Drive thru moves quickly. Friendly staff & drinks were made corrextly.

What's going on with this location? They are always closed in the middle of the day. I'm assuming it's because they can't find employees to work because so many people are on unemployment now. When it is open the drive thru line is ridiculously slow. Come on Starbucks Corporate help this location out!
Slowest drive thru in the world, sadly. Perfectly nice staff and good coffee but the design of the drive thru and possibly bad management makes it a chore
Definitely a Starbucks fan/addict and have been for years!

Imagine my surprise visiting this location after work today to see that it has closed early, yet again. What's going on with this Starbucks location that it seems to be closed early,  frequently over the past few weeks? Are they short staffed? Do they need to hire more workers? Is the District Manager and Regional Manager aware of the early closures? How do they plan to solve this? Do they not know how to hire effective managers to properly run a store? The other locations in the area appear  to be doing well and haven't been closing early. What's wrong with this location? Seems they may have some issues that need to be addressed. I think this is my sign to support local coffee houses from here on out.
Work on customer service skills drinks were fine

This ‚Äúdrivethru‚Äù is insane. Nodbody understands how to navigate. The line typically extends in the intersection. Its an accident waiting to happen. Also they got my order completely wrong today after waiting in that line forever... gonna try to never go back to this location.
Always great service food and coffee !
Poor organization
Surprisingly fast. Very efficient. Don't trust Starbucks app regarding Out of Stock items. Friendly service!

Always a big long line at the drive thru that blocks traffic and makes it where folks that just wanna come in and get a drink cant even get in. Even when you can finally get past all the cars and get in there it takes forever cause of all the people in the drive thru. This place is a joke. They dont do nothing to stop all the cars from piling up. Trust me stick to the ones that dont have drive thrus.
(Translated by Google) Rich and delicious coffees  (Original) Ricos y deliciosos cafes
They are never open!!!!!! They don't ever legit have a reasoning behind it.
(Translated by Google) Excellent attention  (Original) Excelente atenci√≥n

Thank you so much for the wonderful staff here. I love being a partner and coming into a positive experience before they even realize that I'm a part of the company. They did such an amazing job making sure everyone was taken care of and ensuring items were coming out and and updating us in the status of our order.  They were very busy but very attentive to everyone.  Thank you for all you guys do. Keep up the great work!

This starbucks has HORRIBLE customer service. I order the same drink every visit, the last few times I'm positive that they have put dairy milk in my drinks when I order soy only since I am lactose intolerant. I went through the drive thru today (waited at least 15 minutes) and they made my drink wrong. I parked my car, went back inside and the girl working was extremely rude when I explained that the drink was made wrong. You can't trust anyone who works here to actually do their job.

Not sure what's up with the ridiculously long drive thru wait. I have never been in and out of this place in less than 20 minutes for just one drink. This location is closest to my house but I'll have to start going elsewhere. They do always get my drinks right and have friendly service though.
It was a Cool Experience nothing to major. They all was nice was drinks came up swell üòäüôÇ so Nothing to frantic.
Here I am 25 minutes later sitting in line for a freaking hot coco...... Y'all gotta be crazy! And once you're in the line, you're STUCK. I will never come back here
It was quick. I don't do starbucks. I was going for someone else.
I go there every morning for coffee, great services!
25 minute average wait for an iced coffee in drive thru. Consistently THE slowest Starbucks I've ever been to.

This is my second time at this starbucks- first time the wait was 45 minutes for one pink drink with awful customer service. My most recent visit I ordered an iced caramel macchiato with extra caramel. I got a iced black coffee with milk. Will not be coming back. Do not reccommend.
üëç

Consistently friendly staff but can never get my order correct. The sad part is they recite my order back to me; however, the product is never the same. It's very disappointing as it's the closest Starbucks to my house, but I've decided that I'll  drive the additional miles to another location.

Horrid little store. "Manager" berated me for walking to the store and not having a car when I am environmentally conscious! I was told the store was randomly closed for no apparent valid reason and the drive thru was for "vehicle owners only". I was denied a coffee ! The owners (franchisee I am sure) don't seem to care about the negative reviews. If I had to guess, I would say they are "closed" so that they can cut back on payroll yet maximize drive through revenue right now before the tax year ends in order to make some big savings at the employees and customers expense. Boycott this store and head to the Starbucks on Carmel road (1 mile away down Sharon road in the Harris Teeter shopping center), that store is OPEN, and FRIENDLY. Far superior. Give your money to that owner instead!
Great visit as usual. I've had a drink messed up a few times but they are always happy to fix it. ‚ù§Ô∏è
Worst starbucks around. Yelled at for ‚Äúbeing closed‚Äù when there is no sign. Not to mention is closed yesterday as well. They never have nitro cold brew either. Drive thru takes a solid 15 mins.
don't come here if you are in a hurry the wait is always at least 20 minutes Always
Not sure why this starbucks is still in business? super slow and rude...
So. Incredibly. Slow.
YALL MICROWAVING FROZEN SANDWHICHES BRUH I GOT A BACON EGG AND CHEESE THEN IN THE MIDDLE I BITE INTO A FROZEN EGG IT FELT LIKE COLD BABYFOOD IM TRAUMATIZED
The line was SUPER long and I couldn't wait. You could tell they were understaffed
My favorite place
Slowest Starbucks I've ever been to.

Was just yelled at by the employee taking the drive-thru orders.  Started to place my order and I was abruptly interrupted with ‚ÄúI SAID GIVE ME A MINUTE!!‚Äù So, I SAID ‚ÄúIll take my business to Caribou.‚Äù Would rather go out of my way to a different coffee shop entirely than start my Sunday morning off dealing with that customer service suck fest.
Love them hate the long drive thru lines. But I understand why
Employees very courteous, however not enough staff to cover drive thru...I waited close to 10-15 minutes
never open when it says it is
Good location and friendly staff
(Translated by Google) Delicious  (Original) Delicioso
I always like Starbucks. I've never been to a bad experience.
The single worst coffee place ever created. Not Starbucks, just this location.
Outstanding service.
Great quick service  ..

It's a pretty standard Starbucks but with a drive-thru! One of the few in Charlotte and with the recent "pandemic" super convenient to just go through the drive-thru. The staff have always been pleasant and patient even though the lines have been wrapped around the building the couple of times I've gone.

Horrible experience.  They couldn't wait to get rid of you and just asking for sugar and coffee stirrers got you the looks and attitude. Very very rude personel.....shame on you for not caring for your customers...
Great customer service! Goes above and beyond for nurses!
Didnt like how there last inspection was in February.  The guy in drive up had no gloves.

This Starbucks is convenient and stays busy, but service is horrible and slow. I mobile ordered 5 minutes before I got to the location. I parked and walked up to the "Mobile Pickup" window (door with table in front of it). I stood there for several minutes (3 to 4) while watching 3 employees standing behind the counter talking. There was one girl working making coffee and managing the drive through window. Finally one of the talkers noticed me and asked "can I help you with something?" I responded I had a mobile order. She said it's coming, and I watched her pull several labels off the printer and put them on cups, one of these was my beverage (I noticed the Splenda packets) and she finished making my drink made a couple of others and then brought me mine. On my way back to my car I noticed the drive through line was longer and the car that pulled in behind me had not made it to the menu/order board. Long story, if you want to wait a long time for a mediocre cup of coffee then by all means go to this location, if you want good service and a good cup of coffee go to the Starbucks at Park Towne Village!
Slowest drive-thru in all of Charlotte. It doesn't matter the time of day, nor amount of people in front of you. It's ALWAYS slow! 20-30 minutes minimum.
A good run to quite and cozy place.
Poor and rude service.
Fresh and hot
Robert was super helpful! He noticed his team needed help while he was at the register and he jumped right in. Thanks Robert!

This location was very slow, the barista did not want to redo the order which he admitted he got it wrong. He forgot to put the Carmel drizzle on the frappes and also gave us two butterscotch frappes instead of one vanilla bean and one butterscotch smh ü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è not the ideal Starbucks experience

Waited 20 minutes in the drive thru line. 20 minutes... Think about that. I've had dentists clean my teeth faster. After I got my drink and pulled off, it was the wrong drink. I order a White Mocha, they have me a peppermint mocha. Easily confused wording there. ‚ÄúWhite‚Äù sounds just like ‚Äúpeppermint‚Äù.
Classic Starbucks
Love the cleanliness of this place.
Coffee is my best friend! I love this store, great staff and quick service!
It's a Starbucks, they sell coffee, what do you expect?
Coffee tasted watered down

This location has so much drive thru business in the mornings.. not a convenient stop for coffee if you go inside. And they allowed a homeless man, or vagrant, to sit in the corner and sleep with all of his belongings.  I was there 2.5 hours- he slept the whole time.
I had a great experience at this location. The line was very long this morning but they kept it moving very quickly! I had time to spare.
Great Coffee and service.
Inefficient, just like other reviewers said.

Ordered a Citrus Defender tea. I asked what was in the different Citrus teas and one of them had peaches. I specifically told the drive-through person I was allergic to peaches. The sticker on my drink said Citrus Defender.... but the tea that they gave me was the peach tea. Almost ended up in the hospital because someone couldn't do their freaking job.  When I went to return the tea and told them why I was returned in it I got straight up attitude from the people at the counter. Don't go there!!!! they don't know how to do their job and they have horrible service.
Comments from staff
Expect your drink to take 15+ minutes even if it's a mobile order. Drive through is always backed up as well.
Went through the drive-thru today. William was SO pleasant as I waited for my second drink. His upbeat personality and smile really made my day :)
Good service

I have been using this location on my way to work for several months and love the drive thru experience.   Service is great and order ac urate and thorough.    The security guard to move traffic doing during peak times makes it even better!

I like this Starbucks because it is close to my house and they have a mezzanine separated from main floor where you can get work done. The only negative is the drive-thru almost always gets backed up. Use mobile order if speed is in need. Oh and coffee.

Just ordered the caramel br√ªl√©e latte. It was made completely wrong. I was so excited to try something new. It tasted just like the white mocha that I always get. Very disappointing. The girl at the window did not give me my receipt. Highly unprofessional.

This pour over Christmas Blend I'm enjoying at this Stabucks may be the best cup of coffee I've had in 2019...the perfect strength, a blend of bitterness and smoothness...allowing the subtle tones come through. Well done, Starbucks Staff!
After waiting in the drive through line over 20 minutes they forget to give me my debit card back after paying.  Everytime I have tried this location the service us terrible

Spent over $11 for two drinks and basically had blended ice that had no coffee flavor with a splash of caramel flavor if anything. We first were given someone else's order (drive thru) and then our order. Both went in the trash with the spend. Losing any and all hope in a caffiene fix from Starbucks, period.
Drive through is the slowest known ever. What is the protocol for how many are to attend to making drinks if this is the busiest? Lordt

Every time I come to this location they cut me off when I'm speaking at the drive through. If you ask for additional syrup in your iced coffee they tell you it comes with classic, I understand that but I wanted additional. So when I get my iced coffee not only is there no additional syrup like I asked for 3 times there wasn't even classic when I specifically ordered it sweetened. Their customer service is terrible. I'm sick of paying 3.50 for an iced coffee that isn't even correct. Let alone basically having my card and drink thrown at me. Will not be returning!!!
Slowest drive-through in history

This Starbucks was pretty crowded the day I came.... But there's a parking garage just steps away from the store so parking was easy and there is a second floor just for seating so there was plenty of seating
The barista are stupid.. I order iced they give me hot If I order hot they give me ice.
I waiting 30 minutes in the drive thru line.
This Starbucks drive through is super busy. Hard to get in and out not necessarily the employees fault just poor planning let's put a super Starbucks on a small lot!! Yeah yeah let's do it.
Pretty slow

The employees at this location need to be trained better on how to make drinks. I always get white chocolate mocha fraps that are coffee based and I know what they are supposed to look like. I ordered one at this location and it turned out white which isn't what it's supposed to look like. I informed the drive through attendant it's supposed to be brown because of the coffee and she was rude and said I was wrong. I didn't have time to argue because I was going to work, but this shouldn't happen. It was so bad I threw it out.
Wait time is long and my coffee experience has never been good at this location((
(Translated by Google) The coffee is of quality, only that is worth it ..  (Original) El cafe , es de calidad, solo eso vale la pena..
Very nice and convenientl location. Outdoor dining option and drive through are available. Love the second floor dining area. Very modern feel inside.

Really take like forever to get you coffee, I'm still waiting after 10 minutes ago he is not quit busy. Store is clean and finally my coffee te taste good. Just the waiting because look like they focus in the drive thru.

Its currently 9:20pm.....and we showed up at this location but the doors were locked. The staff was cleaning up. One male associate told me to come in but the doors were locked and the female associate said they were closed while the male associate looked confused. Another customer came up and the female told him they were closed as well. Their website surely says they close at 10pm......why did this female turn us away!!!!!??? We will be calling the manager in the morning!
I always have a great experience at this location and look forward to be coming here for a long time

Very upset. Every-time I go here they mess up my order. EVERY-TIME! I even double check with the person working the drive thru window to verify it's correct. The response I got today ‚Äúumm I mean yeah it should be what you ordered‚Äù. Is that even a real response?! How pathetic. When I pay 5.00 for a coffee I EXPECT for it to be right EVERY SINGLE TIME.

Didnt like this visit at all. I placed my order for a vanilla bean frapp and a muffin it took them 20 minutes to make my drink and the ones they had working one was training some one his name was christian and i stood there and watch the drive thru give out several drinks and i still didnt get mine then i asked the lady as more ppl came in where is my drink she asked christian to make my drink he said im training its not my job to do that and finished training the other women i thought wow how does a person say that and train someone therefore she will act like that when she starts in my opinion. Then i still didnt get my drink. Then a women by the name aysa vame out laughing playing and jokes like she didnt see the line then it took another 5 to 6 minutes to get my drink they joking and playing i told the manager and he said he was going to say something to them he never did. So i guess this is a thing at this place
Great
Beautiful store, great service and small bite selections.  Parking is minimal so be prepared to park in the parking deck or use the drive thru.
Drive thru took forever and then they gave me the wrong drink. By the time I realized it was wrong, I wasnt driving back.  Wont go back to this location again.
Overall a nice Starbucks location, hope the seri e could be more consistent.
Great!!!
Very well
Orders are usually wrong. Tried to call them and they did not answer the phone
Staff was more interested in chatting amongst themselves then helping customers. Wouldn't do customized drinks.
Very friendly staff, very clean restaurant. Cold brew nitro with sweet cream was PERFECT!!
They got my order right. My wait in the drive thru wasn't bad and the staff was very nice.
Had a problem with my bacon sandwich and the manager handled it well. Starbucks so far in every State I've been has held it's standards in taste and service.
Rude associates
Everyday
Great space....tranquil...excellent Starbucks to relax/ have a meeting or just people watch. Their employees are friendly and accommodating! Love this location!!!!

Poor service and bad attitude a lady her name ( Carol ) she's very rude and racist against Foreigner . I called the Customer service and did a complaint against her . And waiting to see the district manager
A special thing about this store is that they have second floor seating  which is new to me. Exceptional customer service.
Definitely not the best Starbucks in the Charlotte area. Usually unorganized, messy and clueless. I go out of my way to another Starbucks a much as possible.

Love the ambience and people at this location. But I've been there three times for Nitro Brew and they were out. This last time I called ahead using the phone number on the app because I didn't have time to waste and there was no answer. I called twice. I went anyway and still no nitro.  This has also happened with food items. Great place and they need to get better at having items in stock.

The website shows an open time of 5:30 AM however when I arrived at 5:47AM the door was locked and I was told by an employee holding up 6 fingers that they don't open until 6 AM. I waited until 6 AM deciding it would be quicker than driving to another Starbucks. When I tried to enter at 6 AM the door was still locked. The employees were very rude when I said the website shows the wrong start time and I was told "that is corporate, we only work here"  Another customer came in while I was there and as we both returned to our cars she mentioned she had tried to use the drive thru and was told "it wasn't ready" .She works across the street at the Hilton hotel and also mentioned that the  service providers at this Starbucks were always rude. Next time I will travel the extra mile to the Starbucks in the Harris Teeter.

This Starbucks has horrible customer service. I work walking distance from this location and every time I go there something is wrong with my order or the person taking my order has a attitude problem! The whole ‚ÄúIf your drink isn't right we will replace it‚Äù rule for Starbucks doesn't go here because every time they mess up they have a problem fixing it! I go out of my way to go to a different Starbucks because this location is HORRIBLE!
I like this location. Friendly and always have Cold Brew Draft ready.
The slowest and loudest group working this morning More employees than customers and still a long wait , hope all Charlottte stores are not the same.

Shout out to the kind gentleman at the drive thru today (Pi-Day: 3/14)during happy hour. He was kind enough to remake my drink without whole milk because I'm lactose intolerant. Thanks for taking care of me and my dairy allergy!!!

I gotta tell you - I was skeptical that this location wouldn't be a total gongshow. I was worried about the traffic it would create for me. These folks are hustlin to get people through the drive through and I appreciate it!

We went through the drive thru to place an order. We realized we made a mistake and asked the cashier to change the order. We applologized profusely but the barista threw a fit. She complained and vocalized her frustration with the change in order even though she hadn't even started making it. When we received our order, it was still not correct which we explained. However, she disregarded what we said and insisted it was. We decided to go to the Starbucks down the road instead since they know how to make it. We were also overcharged because we asked for heavy cream, which this order never usually charges extra for since it is only a small amount.
Friendly staff, dirty restaurant. Men's restroom hadn't been cleaned in days. Gross. Trash and dirt in every visible corner of the store. "Clean" obviously isn't a priority here.
Loved it

So I've been to this location 5 times in the last 2 months for buisness meetings. And 5/5 times they dont have the top 3 drinks I've asked for. Do the math. That's 15 drinks I've been told "sorry sir" on. If my buisness partners didnt like this location so much due to the location for the team, I'd never ever ever come back here.
Went through drive-through today and was fairly quick

I thought January 7 was a bit early for them to already be out of pumpkin spice lattes. (I'm aware it's supposed to be a fall drink, but they're too tasty & popular to be seasonal.) Anyway, most Starbucks shops don't run out until February. I do not go to Starbucks AT ALL if they're not selling pumpkin spice lattes. Their regular coffee can't compete with Donut Shop dark.
Super fun location. Love the lofted area. Lots of great windows and sittf/working/sharing space.
Unusually slow for this location.
(Translated by Google) are good  (Original) ◊ò◊ï◊ë
Very very small store usualky with a big crowd
Dirty and milk left out, yuck
Baristas here always friendly, smiling and quick. Great location.
Beautiful starbucks. Nice guy took my order  Thanks.

Decent coffee. LONG drive through lines but staff is pretty good at moving you through the drive through quickly... Inside is a whole other issue. Each time I've gone in there has been a painfully long wait. Staff seems overwhelmed and gets the order of customers confused as they're making drinks. I feel too bad for them to be upset because they're visibly flustered and obviously trying their best to handle high volumes of people in a small space with a small staff.
Great service.  Baristas worked well together.
Coffee is great. Young Man behind register is rude.
Efficient drive thru
WONDERFUL!!!!
Never go 30 minutes before closing, they were pretty much already closed and we inconvenienced them by coming in.
Friendly staff

There usually a long wait, even if there isn't a long line inside.  There's usually plenty of people behind the counter who just walk by as you wait to be attended, and I've never seen the 2nd register open when there is a long line.  Hygiene is another concern, today I witness the cashier go from collecting cash from the customer ahead of me, to serving the coffee, prepping the food only to walk around behind the counter playing with the tongs.  The very sweet and observation young man that stepped up to the counter seeing the growing line (he's new and the best service I've received here) was taking the trash out, starting taking order without washing his hands.  Proceeded to grab my cup for my drip coffee near the lip.  Lastly, much attention doesn't appear to go into ensuring the customer prep station is filled and trying to get someone's attention behind the counter for more sugar, creamer or stirrers is much like waiting to place an order.... the employees don't acknowledge your presence.
Slow, slow, slow; the parking lot here is also very weird and potentially dangerous to pedestrians.

Really poor customer service yesterday. Staff was more interested in talking with an old co-worker than helping customers. They sold a drink in a size they didn't have the cup lid for and didn't say anything. After about 10 minute wait they just said oh yeah we don't have that size lid in now..

If you have to go to through the drive through in the store the staff is HORRIBLE they are too busy goofing off to actually do the work your order will take twice as long.  and it most likely wont be correct.  everytime I order food through the mobile app it is never made or they have items listed that they don't sell at all.  I've gotten a refund for the food I've ordered more than I've actually gotten the food I ordered.  This staff and location gives starbucks a bad name. Fire everyone and start over
Quick friendly associates. They are eager to help.

Probably one of the worst stores in the city. Nitro cold brew, which is fiercely advertised, is always "down".  And they can never seem to get the simplest of directions for a beverage correct.  Grande  Cold  foam cold brew. In a venti cup, splash of breve before foam,with dark caramel.  The caramel is nevee stirred into the drink and i never get my breve.  And now im being charged extra for foam.
SLOW!!!!!!!!!! Drive through takes FOREVER...

I visit this starbucks frequently and use the mobile ordering system. When I 1st started visiting my lattas were watered down. After some adjustments, now my drink is usually ready when I get there and made the way I ordered it. On occasion I may have to wait but not that often. The baristas are usually friendly and polite. Overall it's a good location.
glad there is drive thru location opened in South Park!
Great atmosphere!
Starbucks my solitude Solace for another day Dressed in ice coffee and milk The clouds vibrant pastels in sunset another Sabbath close My coffee sometimes my only friend who lingers
Always a good stop.. friendly staff
Could be more consistent in making drinks! Follow me on instagram: @mrknowyourangles  Thank you very much
Good location and spacious clean place
Quite upstairs to enjoy a good book and breakdast.

I love this location and the two-story layout. The staff is great, but the music in the morning  is often played so loud that's it's like being in a club. This morning I had to sit on the outside just to hear myself think. Too bad, because everything else about this location is kind of perfect.
Awesome guy at the window!

I have been double charged for multiple drinks at this location. I called to get the situation handled and I was told ‚ÄúI need to go through my bank‚Äù I have been coming to this starbucks EVERYDAY for the past 3 months because of its convience but after being charged double for my coffee multiple times and the wrong orders I am taking myself back to DUNKIN DONUTS! I rather drive 10 minutes out of my way then be taken advantage of for the wrong cup of coffee. Thanks Starbucks for taking care of your customers
Waiting 40 minutes for a drink. Terrible service to top it off.

Rude staff. I was trying to explain that google has the incorrect closing time (11 pm) and they kept repeating that they were closed and wouldn't even speak to me or listen to me. They turned away five different customers in the short time. The closing time really needs to be corrected.  It is not what you say, it's how you say it and the staff was very rude. I will never patronize this location again. This high end area needs better baristas not divas.
I like the layout of this new location but staff is very slow I have never waited so long for a simple iced coffee
They make a perfect green tea flappacino.

The barista Casey who took my order was super friendly and patient! My drink was just right, thanks Chase! Juan made my breakfast sandwhich perfect! The manager Kat made sure everything was just how it should have been. I love this location and its two stories!
Nice :D
Love the Starbuck app especially when I can order ahead and just pick it up and the rewards that go along with it
So good!!

Supposedly this location is open till 11 p.m. on Saturdays. I approached the door at 10:45 and it was locked. The two staff inside looked at me and ignored me from across the room and kept talking and giggling with each other. I knocked on the door and waved for them to come over and they continue to ignore me. The management may want to check with their staff to confirm they are staying open the hours that are expected. Or perhaps the hours are posted wrong on Google.
A Starbucks in a grocery store.
Very friendly barista enjoyed the experience hot chocolate was great
Best customers awesome co-workers
Was awesome and friendly
Very attentive and helpful baristas
Inside is very nice with two stories and drive thru is convenient. Unfortunately staff is very inconsistent and focused on having fun with one another, rather than the customer.
Kid friendly.

One of the newer Starbucks in the area, the layout is extremely well done.  The staff are friendly and quick.  I've enjoyed the experience both times I've been.  The only negative is the parking.  They only have 8 parking spots which is a problem.  There is a parking garage but it appears to be for the apartments.  It hasn't stopped me from going there yet, but it could
I love the people at this Starbucks I. Not sure who the manager is out they do a great job making sure their employees treat customers well.
Nice staff, good size place, but it was so so so hot in there...

Worst Starbucks I've ever visited. The guy who took our order was super nice and so was Brianna (she was at the window and asked us to pull around..we had a large order). The order was read back to us correctly. When we pulled around JESSIE is the girl who brought out our order. Not sure if she is a manager or not but she had a black apron, short hair in a hat, and headset on. She was VERY RUDE. She literally just handed us the order. Didn't speak and when we asked if this was all of it she said ‚Äúyep‚Äù and started to walk away. We said ‚Äúoh ok well you have a good day too!‚Äù Jessie literally threw up a ‚Äúpeace sign‚Äù ‚úåüèº I mean really?! Once we looked through our stuff one of the drinks was totally wrong. Had to go back inside and get it corrected. Brianna again was super sweet. Once we made it back to work, we realized that ANOTHER drink order was wrong!!! We've tried to call this location over and over and nobody answers. Our entire office is extremely disappointed with this Starbucks location and won't be returning. We will be going out of our way to go to another location for better service and correct orders!! Even my 8 year old noticed how rude Jessie was! That's sad.
Coldest starbucks ever, they have not the heater on, it is freezing inside
Really nice location.  Some outdoor seating, pleasant staff, clean etc.

Drive through is quick, staff is friendly, drinks are tasty. Some others have stated their opinion that the drive through is prioritized (and assuming it really is, claim it as a bad thing), but if you see the place you'll quickly realize that due to traffic flow constraints, and the general setup of the store, the drive through must move quickly. There are three other Starbucks locations within a mile where one can sit and relax in person; let us have our amazing drivethrough!  That said, I have ordered inside twice and had great experiences both times. Keep it up Starbucks!

I normally love this place... but today I approached the counter for a request, and stood there for a good 10mins. Even though I was the only customer there, they kept working the drive-through and totally just ignoring me or at least thats how I felt. I decided to give up waiting when an employee walked in through the entrance and they looked past me to say to the employee. No worries, I'm still going to come to the store because is the closest one to me and I come here almost every morning. I even own stocks! Best of wishes with Princi.
Great addition to South Park area! Fairly easy to get in and out of despite being on a busy corner. Fast drive thru service.
Wow great for drive through but very little parking for pickup so make order ahead not so speedy. Could just be Sunday afternoon BOGO maniac.
Over 15 minutes for a tea is pretty disappointing. Drive through customers take priority over people who walk inside which is also something I disagree with.
Only went through the drive-thru for some quick Pike's Place coffees. Service was fast and courteous. The location is fairly easy to get into and out of, even right after lunch.

Very disappointed at the customer service I was given the wrong order when I came to exchange my beverage they claim the cup was from another store, when I tried to explain to the server she shut the window in my face so I had to go inside and talk to the manager, not the quality of customer service that I'm used to when I go to a Starbucks I felt more like I was at a fast food, the server I gave me the right drink but still insinuated that the cup was from another store I felt insulted like I was lying and I don't appreciate that I live less than a quarter mile in Bervely Woods  from the store and I was looking forward for a Starbucks to be there bad bad service bad bad impression

Spacious!  This is the newest Starbucks addition in the area and even though there are around 4 within a 1/4 mile radius, this one may be my preferred location because of the space! -- plus, they have a drive-thru if you are feeling like you don't want to go in :-).  There is a loft upstairs that is awesome.  I did not notice an elevator, so the upper area may not be accessible for those with walking complications.  The retail items were fully stocked and pastries looked fresh. The staff was nice and the service was fast. The parking in their lot is limited, BUT there is parking in the building lot also, along with a few street spots.
Can't beat Starbucks. Great place to stop if you are traveling on i77
Good! Fast!
Wonderful, friendly and quick service. Great team working here!
